name: Binosuke's Revenge
description:
In the year 20XX, a warrior named Binosuke seeks his revenge on the Demon Hand to avenge his ancestors: Banjiro and Benitsu.

---

An action-adventure (gun-boost) platformer created for the Illinois State University Game Development Club 2022 Summer Game Jam. 

The third game in the saga from (now unoficially-officially named) Banjiro Team!

UPDATE 5/19: The Official Soundtrack now has metadata so you can throw it in iTunes with that awesome album art cover and artist info!

---

Resources Used:

Font: "e Electro Box" by wepfont (fontspace.com).

Font: "Source Sans Pro" by Paul D. Hunt (fonts.google.com).

Sound Samples: "breakcore is not a good way to get laid" by hologramsbass (reddit.com).
